original_title: Mariam Baouardy, Soeur Marie de Jésus Crucifié - Une sainte entre ciel et terre
overview: Saint Mary of Jesus Crucified, is a Palestinian Carmelite saint canonized by Pope Francis in 2015, a great mystic given to the world who reminds us of the power of the Holy Spirit. A film of testimonies from personalities living in the Holy Land, from Carmelites, but also from Mariam's texts staged by a young actress. So many elements to open up to a new encounter that can also change everyone's life.

production_companies.name: Fondation Sainte Mariam de Jésus Crucifié

title: Mariam Baouardy, Soeur Marie de Jésus Crucifié - Une sainte entre ciel et terre
